mapper.select: SELECT gt.goods_type_id, gt.goods_type_name,gt.goods_type_pid FROM goods_typeinfo gt

SELECT gd.goods_id,gd.goods_name, gd.goods_price,gd.goods_sales,gd.goods_attr, gd.goods_count,img.image_path goods_images, gs.standard_name,gs.standard_id,gs.standard_price,gs.standard_count FROM goodsinfo gd INNER JOIN goods_image gi ON gi.goods_id = gd.goods_id INNER JOIN image_space img ON img.image_id = gi.image_id LEFT JOIN goods_standard gs ON gs.goods_id = gd.goods_id WHERE gd.goods_id = #{goodsId}
